00001 //
00002 // In order to convert some functionality to Visual C#, the Java Language Conversion Assistant
00003 // creates "support classes" that duplicate the original functionality.  
00004 //
00005 // Support classes replicate the functionality of the original code, but in some cases they are 
00006 // substantially different architecturally. Although every effort is made to preserve the 
00007 // original architecture of the application in the converted project, the user should be aware that 
00008 // the primary goal of these support classes is to replicate functionality, and that at times 
00009 // the architecture of the resulting solution may differ somewhat.
00010 //
00011 
00012 using System;
00013 
00017 public class SupportClass
00018 {
00019         //Provides access to a static System.Random class instance
00020         static public System.Random Random = new System.Random();
00021 
00022         /*******************************/
00026         public class Tokenizer: System.Collections.IEnumerator
00027         {
00029                 private long currentPos = 0;
00030 
00032                 private bool includeDelims = false;
00033 
00035                 private char[] chars = null;
00036                         
00037                 //The tokenizer uses the default delimiter set: the space character, the tab character, the newline character, and the carriage-return character and the form-feed character
00038                 private string delimiters = " \t\n\r\f";                
00039 
00044                 public Tokenizer(System.String source)
00045                 {                       
00046                         this.chars = source.ToCharArray();
00047                 }
00048 
00055                 public Tokenizer(System.String source, System.String delimiters):this(source)
00056                 {                       
00057                         this.delimiters = delimiters;
00058                 }
00059 
00060 
00068                 public Tokenizer(System.String source, System.String delimiters, bool includeDelims):this(source,delimiters)
00069                 {
00070                         this.includeDelims = includeDelims;
00071                 }       
00072 
00073 
00078                 public System.String NextToken()
00079                 {                               
00080                         return NextToken(this.delimiters);
00081                 }
00082 
00089                 public System.String NextToken(System.String delimiters)
00090                 {
00091                         //According to documentation, the usage of the received delimiters should be temporary (only for this call).
00092                         //However, it seems it is not true, so the following line is necessary.
00093                         this.delimiters = delimiters;
00094 
00095                         //at the end 
00096                         if (this.currentPos == this.chars.Length)
00097                                 throw new System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException();
00098                         //if over a delimiter and delimiters must be returned
00099                         else if (   (System.Array.IndexOf(delimiters.ToCharArray(),chars[this.currentPos]) != -1)
00100                                      && this.includeDelims )                    
00101                                 return "" + this.chars[this.currentPos++];
00102                         //need to get the token wo delimiters.
00103                         else
00104                                 return nextToken(delimiters.ToCharArray());
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 //Returns the nextToken wo delimiters
00108                 private System.String nextToken(char[] delimiters)
00109                 {
00110                         string token="";
00111                         long pos = this.currentPos;
00112 
00113                         //skip possible delimiters
00114                         while (System.Array.IndexOf(delimiters,this.chars[currentPos]) != -1)
00115                                 //The last one is a delimiter (i.e there is no more tokens)
00116                                 if (++this.currentPos == this.chars.Length)
00117                                 {
00118                                         this.currentPos = pos;
00119                                         throw new System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException();
00120                                 }
00121                         
00122                         //getting the token
00123                         while (System.Array.IndexOf(delimiters,this.chars[this.currentPos]) == -1)
00124                         {
00125                                 token+=this.chars[this.currentPos];
00126                                 //the last one is not a delimiter
00127                                 if (++this.currentPos == this.chars.Length)
00128                                         break;
00129                         }
00130                         return token;
00131                 }
00132 
00133                                 
00138                 public bool HasMoreTokens()
00139                 {
00140                         //keeping the current pos
00141                         long pos = this.currentPos;
00142                         
00143                         try
00144                         {
00145                                 this.NextToken();
00146                         }
00147                         catch (System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException)
00148                         {                               
00149                                 return false;
00150                         }
00151                         finally
00152                         {
00153                                 this.currentPos = pos;
00154                         }
00155                         return true;
00156                 }
00157 
00161                 public int Count
00162                 {
00163                         get
00164                         {
00165                                 //keeping the current pos
00166                                 long pos = this.currentPos;
00167                                 int i = 0;
00168                         
00169                                 try
00170                                 {
00171                                         while (true)
00172                                         {
00173                                                 this.NextToken();
00174                                                 i++;
00175                                         }
00176                                 }
00177                                 catch (System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException)
00178                                 {                               
00179                                         this.currentPos = pos;
00180                                         return i;
00181                                 }
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184 
00188                 public System.Object Current
00189                 {
00190                         get
00191                         {
00192                                 return (Object) this.NextToken();
00193                         }               
00194                 }               
00195                 
00197                 //  Performs the same action as HasMoreTokens.
00200                 public bool MoveNext()
00201                 {
00202                         return this.HasMoreTokens();
00203                 }
00204                 
00208                 public void  Reset()
00209                 {
00210                         ;
00211                 }                       
00212         }
00213 }
